title: Fleet
summary: Fleet is a JavaScript library that makes it easy to create Ergo transactions. It is lightweight, powerful, and has 100% code coverage. The library provides a fluent API for creating complex transactions. The document also mentions that there is an alternative and potentially more detailed documentation source available on DeepWiki.

qa_pairs.question: What is Fleet?
qa_pairs.answer: Fleet is a JavaScript library that lets you easily create Ergo transactions.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key features of Fleet?
qa_pairs.answer: Fleet is easy to use, lightweight (~12kB minified + gziped), powerful with a fluent API, has 100% code coverage, and is tree-shakeable.

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find more detailed documentation for Fleet?
qa_pairs.answer: For more detailed documentation generated from the repository, explore the Fleet SDK on DeepWiki.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the Fleet SDK Recipes?
qa_pairs.answer: The Fleet SDK Recipes provide common usage patterns and examples for the Fleet library.

qa_pairs.question: What are the benefits of using the Fleet library?
qa_pairs.answer: Fleet is easy to use, lightweight, powerful, has 100% code coverage, and is tree-shakeable.

sections.heading: Fleet
sections.content:
[Fleet](https://fleet-sdk.github.io/docs/) lets you easily create Ergo transactions with a pure JS library. 

- 🪄 Easy to use
- 🪶 Lightweight: [~12kB minified + gziped](https://bundlephobia.com/package/@fleet-sdk/core)
- 🦾 Powerful: easily create complex transactions with a fluent API
- 🧪 100% code coverage
- 🌲 Tree-shakeable

For common usage patterns and examples, see the [Fleet SDK Recipes](fleet-sdk-recipes.md).
